ygData.subject: RE: Binding or not...
ygData.msgSnippet: no way an exploit for using one of our songs cleverly hehe.  a druid friend and i found that little passage a few months ago, before any dragons were killed on
ygData.messageBody:
no way an exploit for using one of our songs cleverly hehe. a druid friend
and i found that little passage a few months ago, before any dragons were
killed on any servers. that's when we conned all the guards in her lair as
level 49 or 50. pretty scary for 2 level 50s prancing around Vox's lair
alone.

we haven't been able to do Vox either. got nagafen a few times but on the
most recent raid it was a disaster.

Lord Nagafen says, "You will not evade me Shada."

everyone there heard that about 20 times each hehe.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

> At least on our server, the GM's have told us that using that
> way in to
> do a Vox raid would be considered an exploit. They do have a huge agro
> range too. On our server, we've managed Nagafen, but Vox kicked our
> butts.
